parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

- zh: Chinese.

- en: English.

Default value: en

parameters.name: OverWrite
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to modify the tag list. Valid values:

- True: Overwrites the existing tag list.

- False (default): Appends tags to the existing list. If a tag key already exists, its value is updated.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The list of resource IDs. These are the IDs of the zones. You can specify up to 50 IDs.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The resource type. The value must be ZONE.
